statements: DELETE FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest' AND change_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis WHERE pixel_id = 100 AND change_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest' AND change_reason LIKE '%urbanization%';
DELETE FROM land_cover_data WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM land_cover_change WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND (previous_land_type = 'Forest' OR updated_land_type = 'Urban');
DELETE FROM spatial_data WHERE latitude = 40.7128 AND longitude = -74.0060;
DELETE FROM satellite_images WHERE resolution < 0.5 AND acquisition_date < '2022-01-01';
